summary: MY 2004 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE INTERIOR LIGHTS STAY ON AND WINDOWS WILL NOT WORK. HAVE HAD THIS PROBLEM FIXED 2 TIMES NOW AND IT HAS HAPPENED AGAIN. ON THE INTERNET IT SAYS IT IS A FLAW IN THE WIRING HARNESS. A BLACK GROUND WIRE BREAKS. ALSO THE VEHICLE IS DEVELOPING THE DEATH WOBBLE WHERE GOING DOWN THE ROAD IF YOU HIT A BUMP THE FRONT END SHAKES VIOLENTLY. HAD THIS SAME PROBLEM ON MY 1997 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. VERY DANGEROUS.
